newsitem.title: USA: Maxim Group to buy Sexton Floor Covering.
newsitem.headline: Maxim Group to buy Sexton Floor Covering.

text.p: The Maxim Group said on Monday it had tentatively agreed to buy Tennessee-based Sexton Floor Covering Inc for an undisclosed sum.
Sexton had annual sales of about $5.5 million last year, Maxim said in a statement.
"Sexton's is a well-managed, profitable floor covering retailer that enjoys significant market opportunity," A.J. Nasser, president and chief executive officer said.
Maxim said it had signed a non-binding letter of intent and the transaction, which was subject to approval by the board of directors, was expected to close in 45 days.
Maxim is the largest floorcovering retailer in North America.
